title: Sun Yoga KL Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Italian, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out
description: A vegetarian cafe attached to a peaceful yoga studio with books and magazines, and soft music playing. An oasis type setting with tall trees and lots of sunlight in the cafe. Menus are 100% vegetarian and halal, with mostly vegan soups and other vegan options. Cakes are mostly gluten free. Juices are fresh, all juice and no additives, not even water. Has own brand of herbal teas made of lemon grass, rose petals, stevia, pandan.
streetAddress: Block A5 (1st Floor) Plaza Jelutong, 5C Persiaran Gerbang Utama
